method: Cut the see-through sponge cake into bite-sized pieces.
In a trifle dish, layer the transparent custard, crystal jelly, glazed fruit, and see-through sponge cake.
Repeat the layers until all the ingredients are used, ending with a layer of transparent custard.
Sprinkle sparkling sugar on top for a touch of shimmer.
Refrigerate the translucent trifle for at least 2 hours or overnight to allow the flavors to meld together.
Serve the trifle in transparent dessert bowls to showcase its beauty.
